text: José Pedro Costa Amorim Cerqueira (born 8 July 1992) simply known as Zé Pedro, is a Portuguese professional footballer playing for Académico de Viseu as a forward. ==Club career== On 14 April 2015, he was an unused substitute in Europa League quarter-finals match against Dynamo Kyiv despite still being an academy scholar. From 2011 to 2015 Zé Pedro played in the third tier of Portuguese football, representing Tourizense and Limianos. On 1 July 2015, Zé Pedro signed his first professional contract with top division club Rio Ave. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:People from Ponte de Lima Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Primeira Liga players Category:LigaPro players Category:Portuguese Second Division players Category:G.D. title: Zé Pedro (footballer, born 1992)
